description: exposes local [port] using ngrok http tunnel
exposes local [port] using ngrok tcp tunnel, specifies tunnel endpoint region
exposes remote [port] on [ip] using ngrok tcp tunnel
uses an ssh tunnel to the ngrok cloud to expose local port 80 using an ngrok http tunnel
run a web server from the current directory on port 9999
brute force subdomains for the specified domain using the specified wordlist and resolver. Continue scanning even if a wildcard is found
brute force dirs or paths on the given baseURL
Fuzz a parameter in a URI. URI must containFUZZ in the place you want gobuster to inject words
Search for and list open buckets. Combination of -w and -p inserts wordlist into patterns
Brute force subdomains using CTR logs. Don't try wildcards
Port scan. Can specify UDP ports with U:[port]
